title: Rivals of Aether

notes:
Added this to launch setting to get it to launch: PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% -popupwindow

Steam Controller controls 2 players, audio skips, runs smoothest at 1x size
title: Rivals of Aether

notes: Everything works fine except for the weird issue with controllers. There is a second controller that is mapped weirdly and ultimately puts two of the same player in to a match.
title: Rivals of Aether

notes: Controllers are duplicated, one with borked mappings on Xbox controller
title: Rivals of Aether

notes: The game itself runs fine for the most part. There are random instances where it seems to stutter but for the most part it runs well. Controllers are duplicated and a second controller with odd mappings essentially corrupts/mirrors the mappings of the primary controller making the game unplayable with a controller.
